text: "Chocolate Salty Balls (P.S. I Love You)" is a 1998 song from the TV series South Park. It is sung by American soul singer Isaac Hayes. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom and Ireland and performed poorly in France where it made number 82. ==References== Category:Funk songs Category:1998 songs Category:Isaac Hayes songs Category:South Park
title: Chocolate Salty Balls
